name: RX_NDC
description: This table contains the National Drug Code (NDC) information.

columns.name: NDC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the NDC (National Drug Code)

columns.name: NDC_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.
